title: The Symbolism of Sacrifice in the Bible
description:
Jordan Peterson in his Easter video spends a lot of time talking about sacrifice. Sacrifice becomes an argument for the existence of "God". https://youtu.be/xPIanlF6IwM

This video follows Jordan Peterson and the History of the Christian God part 1 https://youtu.be/3IJcjwEtHi4 and 
part 2 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2gerC-N83DI 

JBP, Sam Harris, Bart Ehrman, Dr. Drew, Ben Shapiro and Human Sacrifice https://youtu.be/-l9kzqUtLGo

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
